name: FREAKSHOW
description:
Freakshow is a small VR artwork about social anxiety. It is a one room  experience that is short and interesting. I made this project for the Industry III Gallery Show but I wanted to release a stand alone version of  the artwork.

Do NOT view this VR artwork if you suffer from epilepsy or are sensitive to flashing lights or high contrast patterns. Viewer discretion is advised to those who experience agoraphobia or social anxiety.

Consider donating at my Ko-fi :

https://ko-fi.com/alexbabcock

COME BACK to donate if you wish, AFTER you install this game so you can MAKE SURE IT RUNS for you.   

Thank  you for trying out my first public VR artwork! I hope you like it! You can find more of my artwork at alexbabcock.com and @splotchmo on Instagram!
